channel.title: Miscs on Hypergraph Partitioning Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Miscs on Hypergraph Partitioning Archive

item.title: Aggregative Coarsening for Multilevel Hypergraph Partitioning
item.description: The following table presents the results for the paper “Aggregative Coarsening for Multilevel Hypergraph Partitioning”. They are in the process of being integrated into the larger archive. The metric is the number of hyperedges cut. The best result for a given set of parameters is highlighted in bold. Graph name |V| |E| |pins| Number of parts Imbalance stb_amg agg_amg alg_dist zoltan patoh hmetis aa01 8904 823 72965 1024 1.

item.title: Hypergraph_partitioning_results_table
item.description: The metric is the number of hyperedges cut. The best result for a given set of parameters is highlighted in bold. This table contains results for the paper “Relaxation-Based Coarsening for Multilevel Hypergraph Partitioning”. Graph name |V| |E| |pins| Number of parts Imbalance Zoltan-AlgD Zoltan PaToH-D PaToH-Q hMetis Hamrle2 5952 5952 22162 128 1.03 1833 1903 1939.0 1773.0 1715.0 Hamrle2 5952 5952 22162 128 1.
